website_summaries.verdict: Trendy flavors with organic tea in glass bottles. This pricey iced tea isn't for everyone, but is appealing to consumers who prefer out-of-the-ordinary blends similar to those found in tea houses.
pros: Organic with few ingredients and no artificial sweeteners or colors
Comes in glass bottles that consumers say don't interfere with the flavor
Available in several unique flavor blends
cons: Tea flavor is on the mild side, which may not appeal to dedicated tea drinkers

customer_reviews.title: Poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: Not too happy with how this was delivered. The box was wet when I got it but just assumed because it was a rainy day that it had gotten a little wet. To my surprise I cut my hand twice IMMEDIATELY upon opening. One glass was absolutely shattered and ended up everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Charles Jarret

customer_reviews.title: So Good!
customer_reviews.text: This tea is not strong, so if you like a strong, dark bold tea, you may be disappointed. It's not too sweet, but there is a mild hint of sweetness. The lemon and honeysuckle flavors are very mild, and the overall tea flavor is refreshing, especially when served very cold. Pure Leaf Teahouse Collection is hard to find in my area, so I'm happy I can buy it here.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: The.best.prebottled.iced.tea.ever!
customer_reviews.text: The most delicious most amazing tasting ice tea in a bottle you can buy ! so worth the money no other ones compare. The slight hint of honey suckle and the slight hint of fresh lemon with a little bit of honey to sweeten (not overly sweet sugar water like most prebottled ice teas) - just heaven. 90 calories per bottle is totally reasonable too, a small trade for such deliciousness!
customer_reviews.author: Sst6b

customer_reviews.title: MOLDY
customer_reviews.text: I usually LOVE this tea so I decided to buy a few cases because I can barely ever find it in stores..when I got it I started drinking one and noticed it tasted off. There was mold floating all over in it. The expiration date is still 4 months away so I thought maybe the seal was just broken. Grabbed another one and it was the same way. Out of 8 in the case 6 had mold in them. I'll just buy from the store where I can check them first from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So crisp and delicious 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: Over the summer, I have gained a new love for Pure Leaf bottled teas! Hands down, better than Tazo, Lipton, Honest Tea and Snapple tea😉 The flavors are unique and not too sweet. I put a few of these in the fridge overnight, and by the next day, they are so refreshingly cold. Fuji Apple and Ginger Green tea is by far my most favorite. Next fave would be the Blackberry and Sage. Happy to be able to grab a discount for being a Prime member😋😋😋😋
customer_reviews.author: Feather

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking for a replacement for Tazo organic green tea, since they decided to ruin it. This was okay, but not very flavorful. I could taste honey (not honeysuckle), but apparently it's cane sugar. Not much lemon flavor. Weak tea. Reminds me of honey lemon cough drops. The bottles were nice. I wouldn't purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: TawnTawn

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed that I didn't receive the Fuji apple and Ginger Tea that I had ordered because I haven't been able to find it in the stores here in Texas. I'd tried it while visiting in Washington State and really enjoying the light fresh taste of two of my favorite flavors. Saw it on Amazon and gave it a try but was SO disappointed when I opened the box and found Wild Blackberry and Sage Tea. Not impressed!! Tastes watered down with no particular flavor that I can discern...
customer_reviews.author: Lainy S

customer_reviews.title: Tasty for Pure Leaf
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan of Pure Leaf overall but love this flavor. It has very little sugar and only 90 calories. Tastes as good, if not better than, Honest Tea. The packaging is amazingly thick. You could toss this box down a flight of stairs and the glass bottles within would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Delicious; Preposterous amount of Added Sugar
customer_reviews.text: Its delicious... but who cares, because its the most bizarrely unhealthy organic black tea I've ever seen. 1 bottle is a whopping 20 grams of Added Sugar, or 40% DV, which is generous because the current DV standard for Added Sugar is already too lenient (50g per day is NOT healthy)
customer_reviews.author: MadMycoMike

customer_reviews.title: Taste is like no other
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite teas ... even the kids like them. Just make sure when they arrive you check for being broken... happened twice. The one box was open and bottles broken. Just careful because they are glass. But besides that everything was great!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: I love this , it's delicious
customer_reviews.text: Wow ! Im so picky when it comes to TEA ! This is DELICIOUS and it's in a glass bottle I found my FAVORITE NEW TEA OF ALL. ITS SOOOO GOOD , most teas taste slimy or are to sugary but this is PURE PERFECTION in a TEA! IM VERY SATISFIED with this tea
customer_reviews.author: Starlin

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: This ice tea is delicious. I prefer drinking from bottles so it made it extra tasty. I usually reorder but I am such a nitpicker when I saw the price go up (only pennies) in these hard times I said no. But that's just me....your product is great and I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mzmm

customer_reviews.title: love this tea (lemon and honeysuckle) refreshing and crisp without being tart
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tea- it's refreshing and crisp and perfectly sweetened, and doesn't have that weird citrus-y aftertaste or tartness. Something about how crisp it is makes it incredibly refreshing. I live in Florida and if I don't drink stuff I enjoy I just forget to drink and get super dehydrated, so this stuff is perfect. Really lovely.
customer_reviews.author: C.M. & T.M.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had many bottles of green tea and tea blends, this is the first one with fruit flavors that is good. I purchased Organic Green Tea w/a hint of Fuji Apple & Ginger. It’s delicious, I wish it had no sugar, but it’s not icky sweet or syrupy.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great but expensive
customer_reviews.text: The flavor of this is mild and refreshing. By far one of my favorite tea drinks. The hunger flavor is not over powering its more apple. The only down side is how expensive they are!!
customer_reviews.author: World Travler

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tea of all time
customer_reviews.text: I am an iced teaholic, and this tea by far (and so far this flavor—I have not tried all of them yet) is my absolute favorite. It’s smooth, not bitter, has no strange aftertaste, slightly sweet, crisp, light and refreshing. Unlike some other teas, it does not give me the “jitters” that I feel sometimes (which I attribute to either caffeine or sugar content). This is a tea I never get tired of and drink it several times a day everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Gis-L

customer_reviews.title: So tasty!
customer_reviews.text: How I wish I didn't like this tea so much! Fact is, I love it so I'm willing to spend more than $2 a bottle. Perfect balance of flavors and not too sweet. So refreshing when it's cold.
customer_reviews.author: BBQ222

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting... but pricy
customer_reviews.text: I think this tea is the best on the market, but it is PRICY. After you purchase a few cases, you learn its more a treat than it is something for everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B.

customer_reviews.title: There’s something about this
customer_reviews.text: It’s not too sweet. It’s not too lemony. It doesn’t taste artificial. It’s a delightful refreshment.
customer_reviews.author: V&T

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: A little sweet and not as fresh tasting as I would like but it's a good grab and go tea. It's runner up to Teavanna's blacktea with mango
customer_reviews.author: Cane09

customer_reviews.title: Apple ginger tea
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite tea. In the grocery stores it is 50 cents more per container. So I buy it from amazon since it is cheap. It tastes like an apple flavored tea. But not too sweet & you really don’t taste the ginger
customer_reviews.author: Berns

customer_reviews.title: Soooo Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This tea is so delicious and I love the price. The package arrived and was packed very well.My only complaint is that they dont stay in stock ha ha
customer_reviews.author: Chog

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but it is pricey. It makes a break to our drinks but don't order it all the time due to price.

customer_reviews.title: Taste like homemade
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my favorite Pure Leaf chai that was discontinued. Tastes as good as my homemade but really miss the chai

customer_reviews.title: Delicious & refreshing
customer_reviews.text: The organic Pure Leaf Tea Sicilian Lemon is so delicious and refreshing! I’m completely hooked on this tea & I love making fresh Ice tea; however I love these even more! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Zinsmeister

customer_reviews.title: Not Too Sweet Tea
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea! It's not too sweet. You pay a bit over $1.00/bottle here. It's quite expensive in the grocery.

customer_reviews.title: Honeysuckle
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor, the price is a lot more reasonable than at the store I usually buy them at.

customer_reviews.title: Green Tea delight
customer_reviews.text: This is a delicious drink to cool oneself from heat. Green Tea is one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Allyn

customer_reviews.title: Never Again
customer_reviews.text: There is slim to no taste. Gave them away and they gave them out to the homeless.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Delicious tea! Cheaper price than buying individual from the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea. A little pricey but well worth it. Really nice flavor

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously light and refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: Not too sweet, not too bland...just right. By far my favorite Pure Leaf flavor. Will order again :).

customer_reviews.title: Good tea

customer_reviews.text: I really like the flavor of this tea. It is not a strong tea but has a soft flavor. It’s not too sweet.

customer_reviews.title: This tea is the best & I have tried a lot of tea
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea & it’s hard to find at a reg. Store. I’m so glad i can order it on Amazon. I’ve ordered it several times & each order arrives fast & nothing broken.

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: Been getting this product for a while and it has been declining in quality for a while.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves the flavor but I don’t like the price
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves the flavor but I don’t like the price
customer_reviews.author: Mark in Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: found me a new favorite. Not too sweet perfect for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: A tea that is simple and straight to the point
customer_reviews.text: Simple and straight to the point. Not too sweet and just about the right amount of tea.
customer_reviews.author: BravoMan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I could drink a dozen a day. I like the honeysuckle and lemon combo with the tea.

customer_reviews.title: Apparently discontinued
customer_reviews.text: Loved the tea but it is no longer availability anywhere

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting tea
customer_reviews.text: I know these tastes better because they are bottled in glass, but it would be nice if for shipped orders they could put them in plastic containers.

customer_reviews.title: Not as sweet as most other ones
customer_reviews.text: Very refreshing iced tea. Not as sweet as most other ones, and flavors are subtle and complementary with the sicilian lemon and tea. The glass bottle is great especially on hot days, the larger volume is also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Erica W

customer_reviews.title: best iced tea on earth
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for our son in law Tom who has pronouced this to be the best iced tea on earth. guess that deserves five stars!

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but so good
customer_reviews.text: They’re cheaper than individuals at a convenience store, but still expensive. The refreshing ginger flavor, though, is so good! They are shipped in a very secure packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Lehrbass

customer_reviews.title: Clean and not too sweet. I have tried all the flavors and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Cant get enough. Clean and not too sweet. I have tried all the flavors and they are all terrific!

customer_reviews.title: Taste like apple! Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love bubble tea, this drink reminds me of them. I finally found my drink.

customer_reviews.title: Know what your drinking  is healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Natural, pure ingredients from the earth!! Superb quality!! Gave as a gift in 90 gegree weather, much appreciated!!!

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea and can rarely find it in grocery stores So glad for Amazon First had this on a very hot summer day It was icy cold and so good

customer_reviews.title: This tea has a very nice and refreshing flavor
customer_reviews.text: This tea has a very nice and refreshing flavor. It gives me another option for flavored teas to have since I drink so much tea. I don't like really sweet tea and this one is just a tad sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Devin L Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great tea at a high cost
customer_reviews.text: Very good tea, can certainly taste the difference from other brands of teas. It is rather pricy though.

customer_reviews.title: Great iced tea, not too sweet
customer_reviews.text: Very good iced tea. Comes in glass bottles, which I like in a very hot climate. The tea is lightly flavored, not too sweet - very refreshing.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious

customer_reviews.title: Delicious tea!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flavor! I drank this tea while on a liquid only diet and it was terrific!!

customer_reviews.text: It has a faint flavor. I will try another flavor

customer_reviews.title: Very Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I love these....all favors. I could drink 3 a day!! Also like the fact that they are not that high in sugar content. Very tasty!

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This tea is surprisingly delicious and it’s a great price if you big in bulk rather than individually.

customer_reviews.title: VALUE & CONVENIENCE! Check calorie and sugar amounts before ordering. Tastes delicious!
customer_reviews.text: SAVED $1.00 each over $$ in Hawaii PLUS Case so convenient coming to my home!

customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor combination of Fuji apple and ginger, very refreshing when ice cold on a hot summer day.

customer_reviews.text: I love this tea. Its not too strong, not too sweet, best served cold. A nice refreshing change from soda.

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love. Great apple taste without being overly sweet. Subtle hint of ginger. Super delicious!

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: The worst drink I've ever tasted. Maybe I can cook with it. But don't buy this to drink. Awful.

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting Iced Tea Anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive but best tasting iced tea in the world!

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: We really like this tea and order it all the time. The last two boxes had broken bottles, so as long as you don't mind drinking from a cardboard box and get no refund, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Tubach

customer_reviews.title: Best tea
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea, as the ginger is an anti-inflammatory. But it's not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Recommend organic tea!!!
customer_reviews.text: My mom and I are obsessed with the teas. It’s my favorite! I love how it doesn’t leave a gross after taste!!

customer_reviews.title: Delicious iced tea
customer_reviews.text: We love this Organic Iced Tea. Unfortunately, one of the bottles was broken during transit and there was liquid spilled all over inside the box. The remaining 7 bottles are okay though.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite iced tea
customer_reviews.text: It’s difficult to find it in local stores. I really like it.

customer_reviews.text: It’s a fabulous tea. They don’t sell all the flavors which is a bummer. But it’s great when it comes pretty quickly and with no problems.

customer_reviews.title: It is the best green tea I’ve tasted.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very subtle taste, very fresh but not a carbonated or acidic flavor.

customer_reviews.title: When I order them the most important thing is get them to me in a couple of days
customer_reviews.text: I serve these to my guests when having a party and they always say its the best Tea they ever had and I drink about 4 of them A-day I really like them myself great product

customer_reviews.text: The delivery person slammed/dropped the box down so hard that we heard the boom from inside the house. The box wasn't marked fragile and these are glass bottles.

product_meta.title: Pure Leaf, Organic Iced Tea, Sicilian Lemon & Honeysuckle, 14oz Bottles (Pack of 8) (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Lemon & HoneysuckleThe Pure Leaf Tea House Collection features expertly crafted blends of the world's best, USDA-certified organic, loose-leaf tea, brewed in small batches overseen by our tea masters. Each flavor is brewed with exquisite ingredients expertly paired with premium loose tea leaves. The same tea passion of a premium tea shop, but available at the twist of a cap.
feature_bullets: Premium USDA certified organic tea leaves
Brewed organic black tea, organic cane sugar, citric acid, natural flavor, brewed organic lemon peel
No artificial sweeteners or added color
Sicilian Lemon & Honeysuckle flavor; Only 90 calories per bottle

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
